text:
Work with me in Tel Aviv.

Here's how to secure your spot:

Step 1: Actually live in Tel Aviv (duh).
Step 2: Be a profitable entrepreneur or builder.
Step 3: Fill this out → https://tally.so/r/3NdzdW.

Gal & I are building StackHub.

☑ This is not a WeWork.
☑ This is not a "coworking" space.
☑ This is not a business. We don't make money.

We just want to work with the brilliant minds of Tel Aviv, in the same office, inspiring each other.

☑ A magnificent 400 m2 house in Neve Tzedek.
☑ 5-minute walk from the beach (Charles Clore).
☑ Podcast room. Kitchen. Shower. Dog :)

WARNING: I'm not looking for employees.
WARNING: We are interviewing people before.
WARNING: We are already 7 out of 10. 3 spots left!

PS: If you're not a match, but you know the perfect one, tag them in the comments! I'll read them all.
